2+1.sig_info: Start the fight with Primal Sense and Huntress Sense for 3 to 9 seconds.

ALL ATTACKS: On Hit, inflict a non-stacking Passive Neutralize for 2.50 second(s). If this Neutralize is already active, its duration is refreshed instead. Neutralized Opponents have -100% Buff Ability Accuracy.
While the Opponent is Neutralized, If they fail to gain a Buff through Chance, inflict Rupture dealing 4.75 Physical Damage over 1 second(s). Cooldown 1 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: While Charging a Heavy Attack and 0.10 seconds after launching a Heavy Attack, all non-contact hits from Special Attacks have a 100% chance to Miss.
If Tigra Interrupts the Opponent's Attack or causes them to Miss while charging this attack, each Hit inflicts Rupture dealing 47.5 Physical Damage over 18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: If the Opponent is far away from Tigra at any point during a Special Attack she gains Unblockable for the next hit.
Landing an Unblockable strike inflicts Rupture dealing 47.5 Physical Damage over 8 seconds.
FIGHTING NON-COSMIC CHAMPIONS: If affected by Weakness, Slow, or Exhaustion Debuffs, prevent the activation of Tigra’s personal Miss and Unblockable effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation, alternate between triggering Primal Sense and Huntress Sense. Senses last for 14 seconds. Duration is paused while the Opponent is Neutralized.

Primal Sense: Whenever inflicting Rupture, deal a burst of up to 80.75 Physical Damage based on the number of damaging Debuffs on the Opponent. This damage is increased by 100% during Special Attacks.
Huntress Sense: 10% chance for all non-contact attacks from Special Attacks to Miss. Whenever inflicting Rupture or causing the Opponent to Miss, generate 10% of a bar of Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit has a 10% chance to inflict Rupture dealing 80.75 Physical Damage over 4 seconds.
Each damaging Debuff on the Opponent increases the chance of inflicting Rupture during this Special Attack by a flat 10%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Primal Sense and Huntress Sense for 14 seconds.
Inflict a non-stacking, indefinite Rupture dealing 4.75 Physical Damage every 0.5 seconds. This Rupture is removed and reapplied each time Tigra lands an Unblockable strike.

ALL ATTACKS: On Hit, inflict a non-stacking Passive Neutralize for 2.50 second(s). If this Neutralize is already active, its duration is refreshed instead. Neutralized Opponents have -100% Buff Ability Accuracy.
While the Opponent is Neutralized, If they fail to gain a Buff through Chance, inflict Rupture dealing 72.55 Physical Damage over 1 second(s). Cooldown 1 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: While Charging a Heavy Attack and 0.10 seconds after launching a Heavy Attack, all non-contact hits from Special Attacks have a 100% chance to Miss.
If Tigra Interrupts the Opponent's Attack or causes them to Miss while charging this attack, each Hit inflicts Rupture dealing 725.5 Physical Damage over 18 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: If the Opponent is far away from Tigra at any point during a Special Attack she gains Unblockable for the next hit.
Landing an Unblockable strike inflicts Rupture dealing 725.5 Physical Damage over 8 seconds.
FIGHTING NON-COSMIC CHAMPIONS: If affected by Weakness, Slow, or Exhaustion Debuffs, prevent the activation of Tigra’s personal Miss and Unblockable effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation, alternate between triggering Primal Sense and Huntress Sense. Senses last for 14 seconds. Duration is paused while the Opponent is Neutralized.

Primal Sense: Whenever inflicting Rupture, deal a burst of up to 1233.35 Physical Damage based on the number of damaging Debuffs on the Opponent. This damage is increased by 100% during Special Attacks.
Huntress Sense: 10% chance for all non-contact attacks from Special Attacks to Miss. Whenever inflicting Rupture or causing the Opponent to Miss, generate 10% of a bar of Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit has a 10% chance to inflict Rupture dealing 1233.35 Physical Damage over 4 seconds.
Each damaging Debuff on the Opponent increases the chance of inflicting Rupture during this Special Attack by a flat 10%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain Primal Sense and Huntress Sense for 14 seconds.
Inflict a non-stacking, indefinite Rupture dealing 72.55 Physical Damage every 0.5 seconds. This Rupture is removed and reapplied each time Tigra lands an Unblockable strike.
